events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the engineering department. Our recruitment team will proceed with the next steps shortly.
A recruiter specializing in software engineer roles has been assigned to your file and will be in touch to guide you through the hiring process.
The initial screening was conducted focusing on your engineering skills and experience. We look forward to progressing with your application.
Thank you for your prompt response. Your answers to our initial assessment questions demonstrate a good fit for the role.
We have scheduled your technical interview with our senior developers. This is a great opportunity to showcase your engineering expertise.
You have successfully completed the technical interview. The panel was impressed with your problem-solving abilities and coding skills.
Your HR interview has been scheduled. This session will cover company culture, benefits, and your future career goals.
The HR interview went well, and we appreciate your enthusiasm for our company values and your alignment with our team culture.
An official offer has been proposed to you, including details about your role, salary, and benefits. We hope you are excited to join us.
We are thrilled that you have accepted our offer. Welcome to the engineering team! We look forward to your contributions.
Your onboarding has officially started. We will provide all resources and support needed to help you transition smoothly into your new engineering role.
All hiring steps are now complete. We are excited to have you on board and confident you will be a valuable asset to our engineering department.
